Html:
Dear Team,

WSUS Package Publisher is crashing on opening Custom Update window for version: Release v1.3.1407.11 and its previous one.

Whereas for version: Release v1.3.1404.13 I have not experienced any such crashes or issues.

Is there something I am missing in using latest version of releases.
Hi, effectively, I have forgot two DLL files in the latest release. People that have upgrade by overwriting the previous files don't have this behaviour.
